## default\_statement\_schema variable

Default Joi schema to validate log statement against.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
default_statement_schema: Joi.ObjectSchema<Statement>
```

## Remarks

Log statements are validated (only when the option `should_validate_log_statements` is set to `true`<!-- -->.
